item.title: wiki搜索
item.description: wiki.js 安装搜索 整体安装，参考 https://www.bilibili.com/read/cv16951722/ 参考安装ElasticSearch https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/p/257867352 安装好后，需要rebuild Note that if you already have content in your wiki, you must click on Rebuild Index afterwards to import all your existing content into the
